term.title: carbaboranes

item.text: A class of boron compound of general formula [(CH)a(BH)mHb]c where c can be positive, negative or zero. The CH groups occupy polyhedron vertices, and other hydrogen atoms are either bridging or terminal.

notes.item: The contraction 'carboranes' is also well established as the generic name for this class of compound.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1326 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)
